dek: Drawing principally from minimalism, ambient, and krautrock, Swiss producer Benjamin Kilchhofer’s latest is a deeply immersive timbral and tactile experience.
seoDescription: Drawing principally from minimalism, ambient, and krautrock, Swiss producer Benjamin Kilchhofer’s latest is a deeply immersive timbral and tactile experience.

socialDescription: Drawing principally from minimalism, ambient, and krautrock, Swiss producer Benjamin Kilchhofer’s latest is a deeply immersive timbral and tactile experience.

title: Mitteltöner
dek: For his first vinyl release of new music in 25 years, Kerry Leimer makes explicit his debt to kosmische music while recasting these sounds into his own mold.
seoDescription: For his first vinyl release of new music in 25 years, Kerry Leimer makes explicit his debt to kosmische music while recasting these sounds into his own mold.
promoDescription: For his first vinyl release of new music in 25 years, Kerry Leimer makes explicit his debt to his kosmische forbears while recasting these sounds into his own mold.
socialDescription: For his first vinyl release of new music in 25 years, Kerry Leimer makes explicit his debt to kosmische music while recasting these sounds into his own mold.

title: Blood
dek: The second album from Michael Milosh and his soft-rock musicians deftly creates an atmosphere that builds out their sound without adding much underneath.
seoDescription: The second album from Michael Milosh and his soft-rock musicians deftly creates an atmosphere that builds out their sound without adding much underneath.

title: Microshift

title: Full Circle Nightmare

title: Island Universe Story Four
socialTitle: Helado Negro: Island Universe Story Four
dek: Roberto Lange’s fourth installment in his Island Universe series contains subconscious whisperings that provide a map for the music he’s been making as Helado Negro for the last eight years.

title: Pulse/Quartet

title: Quit the Curse

title: 起き上がり

title: Lionheart

title: Outside
